About Me

BIO

I am a Full Stack Software Engineer based in Alexandria, VA. I am proficient in both Front End and Back End development. I am experienced in HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node.Js, Express, MongoDB, React and Ruby on Rails. As a software engineer, I aspire to help bring creative projects to life and demonstrate my commitment to developing exceptional software solutions for your company.

Back End Development

I have extensive knowledge of back-end technologies such as javascript, Node.js, Express, Rails and I am currently sharpening my skills and building projects with Angular, React and Redux.

Front End Development

I am proficent in Javascript, HTML, CSS and React. I can build dynamic websites that are responsive and interacive.

Graphic Design

I have a passion for creative design and I invested time in learning Adobe Photoshop, Premiere Pro and several 3D Animation programs such as Maya, Houdini, Zbrush and Realflow.
